short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Schedule & Share articles to all your social platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you can easily share posts on all your linked social media accounts such as Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr and LinkedIn.

Note: This extension only works in combination with a (paid) iMonitoring subscription.
